title: Cos, veg and almond salad
ingredients: ['2 cos lettuces, chopped', '2 carrots, grated', '2 small plum tomatoes, finely chopped', '1 small red onion, diced', '2 to 3 tablespoons flaked or chopped almonds', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '3 tablespoons balsamic vinegar', '2 tablespoons water', '1 tablespoon fresh chopped parsley', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper']
